nodes.name: calculateGrantClaim

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested
 It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateGrantClaim` before calling this
nodes.name: claimVestedTokens
removeTokenGrant

attributes.name: calculateGrantClaim

attributes.documentation:
@notice Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested
 It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateGrantClaim` before calling this
attributes.name: claimVestedTokens
removeTokenGrant

params._grantId: grantId of the token grant recipient

calculateGrantClaim(uint256).notice: Calculate the vested and unclaimed months and tokens available for `_grantId` to claim Due to rounding errors once grant duration is reached, returns the entire left grant amount Returns (0, 0) if cliff has not been reached

claimVestedTokens(uint256).notice: Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateGrantClaim` before calling this

removeTokenGrant(uint256).notice: Terminate token grant transferring all vested tokens to the `_grantId` and returning all non-vested tokens to the V12 MultiSig Secured to the V12 MultiSig only
